title: Moving composites when generating glyphs doesnt work in FL
content:
Hi all,

according to the FL manual you should be able to move a composite automatically when generating a glyph. Example from manual: A+~-200cedilla=Acedilla

This doesnt work in my FL. Does anyone have had the same problem ?

I am using FL 5.0.4

Regards,  
Jacques
author: fonthausen

comments.content: Are you editing the alias.dat file in the Program Files/Common Files/Fontlab folder?
